Reviews.Title: Works Great, instalation instructions need improvment
Reviews.Author: J. Hastings
Reviews.Content: The instructions are good once the processor is installed.  They need to include diagrams and written instructions for a person like me who is not electronically adapt.  However the instrutions for setting date, time, quads etc, once you figure out how to get it to work with the recorder and monitor, are very understandable.  Once it is all installed, the processor works great.  I like how you can very easily use 1, 2, 3 or all 4 cameras and change set up whenever you want.  For the price, it is very reasonable and works well with an older system.

Reviews.Title: Color Quad Procesor 1EY
Reviews.Author: Brandon G. Racine "WRENCHRIGHT"
Reviews.Content: Works better than I ever thought.  Very happy and satisfied. Thank You. Connot go wrong for the price.

Reviews.Title: COLOR QUAD SYSTEM
Reviews.Author: RAM
Reviews.Content: I have 4 security cameras and need to view them on one monitor.  This unit fills the bill with lots of extra bells and whistles.  Read the product description and it will tell you all about it.  This unit is very small in size 6X4X1-1/4 inches.  One feature that they don't mention is when the unit is turned on it comes up showing all four cameras on one screen, one in each quadrant.  Why is this important?  The way this device is used in this my application it is located with 4 mini DVRs VideoSecu Mini Security CCTV DVR Recorder Motion Detection Overwrite Schedule Videos with Audio Recording 3UAin a small hidden locked cabinet.  The output of the Color Quad System is feed via one Siamese RG59 coax to a video capture adaptor that plugs into a USB 2 port on a PC.  The two wires on the Siamese cable control the power to the Color Quad System.  This allows the system to be powered up only when needed from my computer location to view the image which always comes up as all four cameras on screen.  This set up also allows you to record the images on the PC.  Some one who breaks in and could get to the PC and figure out how to see the images would think that the PC is the recorder and not realize that this was not the case.  I would buy this product again as it meets all my needs.

Reviews.Title: Great product, cheap price, straight to the point
Reviews.Author: VT
Reviews.Content: It does exactly what I wanted - a four-way split on a single screen showing my 4 cameras.  It has more complex software involved if you're interested (ex: zoom, motion detection, etc.), but this isn't necessary for my situation.  I put up cameras to monitor my dogs in the backyard just by changing the input on my television (and one on the front porch to see visitors).  For this application, it worked flawlessly and I couldn't be happier.  I've had it for about 8 months now, and it works just like new.  It also notifies you if a camera goes down (if, for example, a wire or plug gets jostled and becomes temporarily loose) with a loud set of beeps.  Cool product.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Big things in small packages
Reviews.Author: A. J. Richter "Seeker's Quest"
Reviews.Content: For the money, I wasn't expecting much, But Size can fool you & in this case, It Did.First, It was simple to hook up & the adapters that came with it were Great. The fact that it only supports 4 Cameras, was what was needed at the time & the choices of your Viewing Patterns are great as well. It even has controls on the remote to ZOOM in-out as you wish. and the Automatic Timed switching setting is a Plus, making it easy to see all cameras in sequence.I'll be ordering more units as budget allows.One word of advice, If your Handy with a Soldiering Iron, You might want to check fore Loose Connections inside, THIS WILL VOID your Warranty, But for the LOW Price, I'll risk it.

Reviews.Title: Makes Color Cams Almost Black and White
Reviews.Author: A. Williams
Reviews.Content: The overall video quality of this Quad Splitter is very poor and washed out. Color cameras look like they are black and white. Text overlays are small and pixelated. A better choice was the more expensive Quad manufactured by Clover (but apparently no longer available).

Reviews.Title: Dead on arival, coil not properly soldered...
Reviews.Author: baraesk
Reviews.Content: It was dead on arival. I took it apart and found a coil with one end not soldered to the board. After soldering it properly, the unit worked flawlessly.I rate it 3 star because it was dead on arival. In terms of functionality and features I would rate it 5 star.

Reviews.Title: Color quad processor
Reviews.Author: Chuck Hall
Reviews.Content: This color quad processor is excellent for the money seen other ones do the same thing but they were much more expensive.

Reviews.Title: Quad Spliter / switcher
Reviews.Author: Scott Sutton
Reviews.Content: I received this unit and opened the box to find the main unit, power supply and remote control. I connect a video source to the #1 input and the output to a monitor just to ensure the unit was operational.Everything worked as stated. I saw four separate picture areas and the #1 was of my input video source. I could bring up the source full screen and there are outputs to feed a DVR as well as a monitor.All in all I am happy with this unit. It was exactly what I expected.

Reviews.Title: Died less than a week later!
Reviews.Author: S. KRAMER "VisualSuccess"
Reviews.Content: Purchased it, got it working, and wala less than 2 weeks later it was dead.  Yup, this thing sucks!  I would reccomend it if you want to waste money!

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: John F. Keith
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best switchers I have ever used.  High quality and does everything described.  Very versitle and compact.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Office Home Security Camera CCTV Color Surveillance Video Quad Splitter Processor 1EY
Reviews.Author: Robert Axley
Reviews.Content: Got The Video Quad Splitter On Jan 8 2014 .Work Great. The User Manual Was A Little Fuzzy .Hook Up The Processor To My CCTV Single Camera VHS Recorder Work Good Recording 3 Camera At Once. Is Nice. Have Not Try The VCR Hook Up . But Im Sure It Will Be Nice Ad On For Back Up. Every Thing The Seller Said About The Splitter Is Sweet. Hook Up Was A Little Corn Fuse But Went Well .Took The Montor Out On The Processor And Feed The Line Into The Single Camera CCTV Recorder Use The Montor Out To View All Three Camera .Only Record One Channel At One Time .Or You Can Record Four At Once .The Side By Side And The PIP Work Great Also. You Can View One Pip Or Two .The Side By Side View Is Nice .The Picture A Little Long But Good. Once You Get It Up And Running And Hook Up The Way You Like . You Should Have No Trouble Fig Out The Rest .The Remote Is Nice It Took Awhile To Fig It Out Every Thing Went Well The Zoom Works Too Good If ou Got A Good Camaera You Can Read The Plates Numbers On Your Car Nice And Clear .The Auto Sequence Is Nice For Viewing All The Camera One At A Time .The Motion Setup Is A Must And Work With What I Have Running On The Quad Splitter . It Loaded With Alot Of Sweet Extra .It A Nice Little Package. Money Well Spent .This Is The One Everyone Needs I Give You FIVE STARS FOR A SWEET Product .

Reviews.Title: Decent
Reviews.Author: AppleMan
Reviews.Content: Just received this today. Reading the reviews I was somewhat skeptical, because you never know which review you can relate to. But, mine worked perfectly. Unboxed it, connected the 2 cams I needed it for and works just fine. It's annoying when people complain about quality and whatnot. You get what you pay for, it's a $40 unit - if you want HD spend some real cash. I just needed something simple to split 2-4 cams I have around my house for live constant viewing. I'm fairly electronically advanced so setting the menu, date/time was quite simple. Thanks for sending me a unit that actually works and gets the job done. Now, only HOPE it continues to work over time and doesn't die!Edit: 2 weeks later, the timecode on it dies out. I'm sitting here watching it as I am typing this, the seconds is flickering back and forth, skipping numbers. I can turn it off and back on and it resets properly, but goes right back to the problem. Everything else works fine, just timecode issues. If any further issues, I will add on to this.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Office Home Security
Reviews.Author: Mrs Dee
Reviews.Content: This box was exacty what we needed. We had purchased 2 others that didn't do what we needed and returned them. The price was reasonable and it works great. Small and compact as well.

Reviews.Title: Defective and SELLER charged me for RESTOCKING FEE
Reviews.Author: SD V
Reviews.Content: This product Dead on Arrival.The unit just keeps flashing leds and no video.After returning the unit (bought another unit as the seller will not cross-ship item), the seller charged me a  Restocking FEE..BUY SOMEWHERE ELSE that values customer, NOT A one time business model.

Reviews.Title: Problems with the BNC connections
Reviews.Author: Bob Vanderwerf
Reviews.Content: The BNC connections on the rear of the unit are loose.  If it isn't moved the unit works very good.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!!
Reviews.Author: Ruso Minnifield "PrinceHappy2"
Reviews.Content: This Color Quad Splitter works great.  You see, I install security systems for peoople all the time.  I bought one for myself just to see the quality before I started recommending it to patrons.  It exceeded expections and I bought two more.  The price was great and the quality is outstanding.

Reviews.Title: Qud splitter
Reviews.Author: GED
Reviews.Content: I have two of these units and use them to view eight sony cameras all rolling on a single monitor.  They work very well for what I am doing.Garry

Reviews.Title: Easier than instructions imply.  Instruction make it sound complicated.  Hook it, turn on and it works.
Reviews.Author: Bill Schebeck
Reviews.Content: Instruction make it sound complicated.  Hook it, turn on and it works.  Then add features.  This a good started unit.

Reviews.Title: small
Reviews.Author: aksound
Reviews.Content: I klike unit the connections are not tight on the unit sysmy flickers a lot but once stable its ok I like the compact unit can carry in my laptop bag very nice colors are nice

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: lacy smith III
Reviews.Content: great product for those who don't want or can not afford dvr multi-plexer (those typically offer audio for the playback).

Reviews.Title: Worked right out of the box
Reviews.Author: J & LM
Reviews.Content: Easy setup, works great. hope they still make these years down the road when we are ready for replacement. Others seemed to have issue with them but we bought two and both work great. Put's the video in quad screen live motion not delayed or compressed.

Reviews.Title: Great little device
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect device to get a quad image (4 sources on one screen).  I purchased it to use at our church for our camera monitors and it worked great.  The only annoying part is the buzzer that sounds when a feed is lost, but thankfully you can turn that off.  Great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Order ahead of time
Reviews.Author: Love2Shop
Reviews.Content: I suggest that you order this product well before you need it. As other reviewers have mentioned, there are some wiring issues. The first unit I purchased was DOA. It would flicker the lights when turning it on or off, but it was non-operational. I sent it back and ordered a second one. The second one worked (although it is a little touchy).So to review the working product, I'd say that you get what you pay for. It's a bit buggy. The instructions are poorly translated and pretty much useless, but the product (if you are lucky enough to get a working one) is decent. You aren't paying hundreds of dollars, so don't expect too much and you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: Cindy Vos
Reviews.Content: This is a good quad splitter especially for the money.  Very easy to hookup if you know how, since if does not come with information on what cord goes where.  Shipped very fast.

Reviews.Title: 11 yr lead installer
Reviews.Author: Magyver
Reviews.Content: Works great, super easy to use. Unbox and it works. Up and running in 30 seconds.  Does what it says and at that price, its perfect.  Thinking about getting a few more for some trick stuff.

Reviews.Title: Great value, easy to use
Reviews.Author: Ross Jordan "Shalop"
Reviews.Content: I didn't need to read the directions to set it up for a 2 camera system with a vertical split. The buttons on the splitter offer full functionality if the remote gets lost.

Reviews.Title: Security cams
Reviews.Author: Philip Weygandt
Reviews.Content: Came on time. Would buy again from this vendor, product came as advertised have used this item worked fine easy setup

Reviews.Title: Good receiver for the money
Reviews.Author: Floorguy
Reviews.Content: Was looking around for a switcher like this, for cameras I put up in a gym for moms to watch their kids.These were a FANTASTIC price vs what I had seen out there.  With a ton of optionsExcept 1Wish you could do the split screen (2 camera pictures) with cameras 3 & 4...  Only does 1 & 2.  But the gym keeps it in the 4 screen mode all the time anywayI bought 2 because of the price, and thinking I was going to be hooking it up differently.  But only need 1 (now I have a back up)Also it may have a problem that I mentioned in a review on the BNC connectors.Connectors are looseRCAs don't fit like they shouldConnectors on unit don't allow tight connection.Other then that they are great

Reviews.Title: great quad
Reviews.Author: movie freak
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and still working great . Great price and quality,  would buy again . arrived quickly and very easy to set up  .

Reviews.Title: Exactly as described.
Reviews.Author: rbtvance
Reviews.Content: Exactly as described. This item was was well packaged, shipped and received promptly, and was exactly as described. This is a good product and was good customer service.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: jaime
Reviews.Content: Quad splitter was easy to install, easy to work, and gives a good clear picture.  The instruction were clear and simple.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: P. Yorke "Florida Owl Guy"
Reviews.Content: The unit has 4 video inputs and 3 outputs, so you can use it as a splitter and feed a single video to three devices. The PIP allows you to combine two pictures in a very professional way.

Reviews.Title: instructions
Reviews.Author: jack
Reviews.Content: unit is good so far for operating video cams, but there should be better instructions as to connecting this device. other then that it's ok

Reviews.Title: Do not Purchase!
Reviews.Author: David B.
Reviews.Content: What a horribly built and designed product. I took it out of the box and instantly noticed parts rattling around inside the unit. Hooked it up and not only did it not work but it started to smoke so I immediately unplugged it. Sent it back for a refund. Buy and use this product at your own risk.

Reviews.Title: Piece of Junk
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: Wow, what a cheap piece of junk.  Didn't even work when it came - something rattled when I shook it, so I opened it up and a coil had fallen off the circuit board.  Soldered it back on myself to save time and trouble, but the device itself is awful.  It overdrives the video; setting up motion detection is unbelievably cumbersome; the audible alert on motion doesn't work at all.Save your money.

Reviews.Title: ***Died after continuous use for (1) year and (7) months***
Reviews.Author: Sam's-Review
Reviews.Content: I bought this device back in May 2012. For the money this device worked very well I must say. However, this is an update... todays is Oct 9, 2013...this device finally died after continuous use for (1) year and (7) months. This means the device was never (turned off). If you have a home CCTV system, your devices or equipment must run 24 hours 7 days a week, otherwise that would defeat the purpose of CCTV, right?  So after (1) year and (7) months usage this device burned out. Wow! So I have downgraded this device to (3) stars. I want a quad processor to last me at least (5) years. I have already ordered a new quad from a different manufacture. Remember these types of components are (hit and miss) so make sure you shop around and do your research, buy what's right for you. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: SEEMED OK, WORKED
Reviews.Author: L. E. WAGNER "ERIK"
Reviews.Content: SEEMED OK, WORKED FINE WHAT MORE CAN I SAY? IT IS WHAT IT IS AND WHEN YOU NEED SOME THING YOU TRY FOR THE BEST PRICE BUT ALSO GOOD QUALITY

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu CCTV Color Quad Splitter Processor
Reviews.Author: PuterGeek
Reviews.Content: January 2013: I purchased this item in September of 2012 - today when I turned it on all the lights did not light up as usual and it appeared to have died.  Other than that, it was hard to use the remote with the unit because you need to be literally a foot away from it and sometimes the remote doesn't work at all.Update 2/8/2013:  I was debating whether or not to trash it or take it for repair; for some reason I thought to try a different power supply/switching adapter and found out that the unit itself was not bad but the included power supply had died!  Ordered another 12V generic power supply for security cameras that works fine to power up.I use this unit to do live monitoring of my front and side walkways when I am at home during the day as I am every day.  I have found that this unit serves the purpose very well if you need only a 4-camera view on one flat-screen TV screen (I don't use a separate monitor).  I had to purchase adapters for my older security camera connections.I only gave it three stars because there isn't any warranty and the remote doesn't work as well as it should even at close range.

Reviews.Title: Cheap, but you already knew that
Reviews.Author: troland
Reviews.Content: Ordered (5) of these for a project i was working on.  (4) of them worked fine, the last one was dead on arrival.  I just threw it away.  They are cheap, but will suffice if that is your price range.

Four camera outputs can be combined into one video signal for simultaneous display and recording
Selectable picture in picture modes, quad split mode, full screen mode, PIP screen mode, dual split mode, auto sequence mode
Camera title, time and date display for easy identification, 4 channel BNC input and 3 video BNC outputs
Freeze picture capability for each camera, audible notification of motion detected
Plug and play, very simple to install, comes with 12V power supply, free remote controller
